text: George Russell Ellison (January 24, 1897 – January 20, 1978) was a Major League Baseball pitcher. He pitched one inning for the Cleveland Indians in . On August 21, he came into a game during a doubleheader against the Boston Red Sox, walking two batters and striking out one without allowing a hit or a run. ==Sources== Category:1897 births Category:1978 deaths Category:Major League Baseball pitchers Category:Cleveland Indians players Category:Portland Beavers players Category:Sportspeople from San Francisco Category:Baseball players from California Category:California Golden Bears baseball players
title: George Ellison (baseball)
